stripped_text: The first time each turn a tag is removed, you may reveal and install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. click, remove 1 tag: Gain 2 credits.
text: The first time each turn a tag is removed, you may reveal and install 1 card from HQ, ignoring all costs. [click], remove 1 tag: Gain 2[credit].
title: Synapse Global: Faster than Thought
